entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
